parameters.query: =INSERT INTO assignments (lead_id, persona_id, variant_subject_id, status, send_at) VALUES ({{ $('Split Campaigns').item.json.lead_id }}, '{{ $('Split Campaigns').item.json.persona_id }}', '{{ $('Split Campaigns').item.json.variant_id }}', 'queued', NOW()) RETURNING id

=UPDATE assignments SET corr_id = '{{ $('Send Email via Brevo').item.json.messageId }}', status = 'sent', sent_at = NOW() WHERE id = {{ $('Record Assignment').item.json.id }}; INSERT INTO events (assignment_id, type, meta, ts) VALUES ({{ $('Record Assignment').item.json.id }}, 'sent', jsonb_build_object('email', '{{ $('Split Campaigns').item.json.lead_email }}', 'subject', '{{ $('Split Campaigns').item.json.subject }}', 'message_id', '{{ $('Send Email via Brevo').item.json.messageId }}', 'variant_id', '{{ $('Split Campaigns').item.json.variant_id }}', 'from', 'p24priyesh@gmail.com'), NOW()) ON CONFLICT (assignment_id, type) DO UPDATE SET meta = EXCLUDED.meta, ts = EXCLUDED.ts RETURNING *
